div.p: rough draft to BEGIN TO identify synonym group members for analysis, based on CL etc. 18.11.2003. CH ／ LU JIANMING

bibl.title: Encyclopedia of Language and Linguistics. Second Edition

sense.def: 使之富 "cause them to become rich" him, her, it, them
與之俱 "be together with him"
則臣服之"the ministers will then follow it": referring to an aforementioned object: him, her, it
臣聞之“I have heard the following:" the following object, the object identified further down in the context
誨女知之乎！"I'll teach you to understand things": things; a place; something [cognate object; indefinite dummy object pronouns without reference]
知之曰知之 "if you understand something say that you understand IT" anaphorically refers to whatever a preceding nonreferential object pronoun refers to
賜之卮酒 "offered him a beaker of wine"
此之謂 莫之，未之
rarely used as an apparently full pronominal subject: this one 之十有三"these are thirteen in number"
欲之“I wish to do this": (wish) to do this
主信愛之“If the ruler trusts and looks well after one": indefinite, personally "one" in the function of object
君好之“If the ruler likes something/anything": non-referential general: anything/anyone
以善和人者謂之順 "to accord with others on good points THAT is called obedience": refers to the aforementioned situation
a certain
pivotal pronoun, as in 不能令其下也
for him/her/them
(in subordinate sentences) he, she, it, they
singular: the subject's, her, his, its
him
(non-emphatic, non-contrastive:) he
the aformentioned and no one else, they
at some N, V
some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others
some, certain individuals (referring to the subject of the verb that follows); someone, anyone
someone, anyone
the aforementioned unidentified person
a certain person
a certain npro belonging to the category N [many examples of SOME need to be moved here!CH]; certain such npros
some, any
there are those who
the one..., the other 二者，或有餘於數，或不足於數，
somebody of N; one of N
爾所及 "what you reach"
所重"what one makes one's priority": the object which
所愛美女 "beloved beautiful lady"
其所安
吾所欲者 “what I desire to do"; in object position: 有所不行“have something one does not do"
direct object: 所樂 "what (the understood/contextually determinate subject) enjoys": that which (the understood subject) Vt-s； the object Vt-ed by the the understood subject
所受教 "those one has received teaching FROM": prepositional indirect object; like hypothetical 所於
e.g. 所夢也 "it was what he had dreamt of" be the object of Vt-ing by the explicit or implicit subject in the context
所與立 "those whom one stands together with": those Vt-ing which/whom the explicit or implicit subject V-ed or V-s
e.g. 人所制 "someone controlled by others" the object npro that N Vt-ed; the object Vt-ed by N> that which is Vt-ed by N, he who is Vt-ed by N
無所告 "have no one to complain about N to": pronoun referring to the indirect object of a ditransitive verbal expression with an omitted direct object.
e.g. 其所由然 "that through which it is so": object pronoun

所聞於相國 "what (I) have heard from the prime minister of state" direct object of a ditransitive verbal construction ((Note that the subject, if explicit, is often an explicit modifier marked by 之, as in 臣之所聞於魏 "what I have heard from Wei".))
人之所積也“what men accumulate": the object Verb-ed by N
e.g. 所亡地 "the territory that he has lost": the npro object which the understood or explicit subject has Vt-ed
e.g. 人所罾魚腹 "the stomach of a fish someone else had caught in a net" object pronoun modifying a head noun

世主之所亂惑"what confuses the sovereigns of our times": the subject which Vt-s the object N [NB: MANY OF THE ATTRIBUTIONS HERE ARE DOUBTFUL: 除民之所害 may be read as "remove what the people consider to be harmful" and not as "remove what harms the people".待考
the an identifiable as such-and-such, such-and-such N
such-and-such
after vi-comp: than this =於之
忠焉 "If one is loyal to someone"
to him
from it; from this
among them
for this, on this occasion
同焉 "to identify oneself with him", with rergard to him, in relationship to him
in that place，there
in/during that event
like 之: he; she; it etc.
for it: as in the phrase 無它故焉 "there was no other reason for it"
loan for yān 焉
variable: x
the object(s), this, him; them; the other
each others' N 相亂國 “vt each others' state"
斯三者“these three": nominaliser after a number phrase or numbered phrase
a certain N
the one who
a certain, unidentified but in principle identifiable by the speaker, who
generalising tensed: someone who V-s (typically tensed); anyone who V-s
(be) someone who V-s (some other examples need to be moved here!)
generalising, hypothetical, untensed: anyone who V-s
those of the category V
referential: the subjects of V
the subject of whom it may be said that the relevant N V-s; the subject of which the predicate in the form of the subject+predicate is predicated 功大者
such of the Ns who V
the kind of person that V-s
the npro that V-s
the action of V-ing
pronoun preceded and modified by a number verb.
one another
contraction of 之於
contraction of 之於
the former, the above-mentioned other party; the above-mentioned people
post-Han: the latter
that previously mentioned but unidentified person
this (used to make four-character phrases. Also elsewhere??)
you
a certain person; someone; a quidam
the object(s)
the object(s) (of Vt)
the object(s) (of Vt)
be so-and-so
topicalising or nominalising a preceding sentence: this
其所樂 "what he enjoys" the object of the transitive verb that follows, "that which"
其所害"what is harmful to him" (and NOT: "what he does harm to"): what Vt-s the subject referred to by 其
地之所載"what the earth bears up" (and NEVER "what bears up the earth"): the object which the preceding N V-s
